> Full-time Realtor for 19 years! Southern MD Association of Realtors Hall of Fame! FAA Licensed Pilot!I encourage you to compare my reviews and number of past sales (400+) to other Realtors to see why I am the right Realtor for you. Buying or selling a home? Finding the right Realtor can make all the difference in your real estate transaction and can save you thousands of dollars and months of aggravation! As a lifelong resident of Southern Maryland, I am extremely familiar with not only the area, but the needs and expectations of my clients that I serve in this area. When you need a real estate professional, consider the following: - I have 15 years of full-time experience! - I am REACHABLE and AVAILABLE! - I know what it takes to market your home effectively! - I will listen to your needs and exceed your expectations!- I have 11 years experience in new construction! - I have an extensive knowledge of Southern MD: Calvert, Charles and St. Mary's Counties! I'm considered by my clients to be an expert negotiator and an aggressive marketer. Not only do I provide superb service to my clients, but I also provide solid advice. I live and breathe real estate, and I am emerged in it every day of my life. I work extremely hard to make the transaction as quick, smooth and painless as possible, while keeping focused on the goal of maximizing your dollars. I am hands on in everything I do and surround myself only with top professionals in the industry. I am REACHABLE from 9:00 am till 9:00 pm via email or phone.
